I2C_FxnTable_s Struct Reference
I2C Driver » I2C Driver API

The definition of a I2C function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific I2C driver implementation. More...

#include <I2C.h>

Data Fields

I2C_CloseFxn closeFxn

I2C_TransferFxn transferFxn
 

Detailed Description

The definition of a I2C function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific I2C driver implementation.

Field Documentation

I2C_CloseFxn I2C_FxnTable_s::closeFxn

Function to close the specified peripheral

I2C_ControlFxn I2C_FxnTable_s::controlFxn

Function to implementation specific control function

I2C_InitFxn I2C_FxnTable_s::initFxn

Function to initialize the given data object

I2C_OpenFxn I2C_FxnTable_s::openFxn

Function to open the specified peripheral

I2C_TransferFxn I2C_FxnTable_s::transferFxn

Function to initiate a I2C data transfer
